name: pr-notes
description: Create github pr review comments using your voice

pr-notes.apiUrl.description: Base URL for the speaker diarization API service

pr-notes.timeout.description: Timeout for API requests in milliseconds (default: 5 minutes)

pr-notes.inputDevice.description: Selected audio input device ID for recording. Use 'default' for system default device.

pr-notes.postToGitHub.description: When true, post PR review comments to GitHub (when signed in and on a PR branch). When false, only create local VS Code comments.

pr-notes.owner.description: Override GitHub repo owner (e.g. 'octocat'). When set with repo and pullNumber, used instead of git remote discovery.

pr-notes.repo.description: Override GitHub repo name (e.g. 'my-repo'). When set with owner and pullNumber, used instead of git remote discovery.

pr-notes.pullNumber.description: Override PR number. When set with owner and repo, used instead of resolving PR from current branch.

pr-notes.geminiApiKey.description: Gemini API key for processing speech segments. Get one at https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

scripts.vscode:prepublish: pnpm run build:helper && pnpm run compile
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
